name: KaleaB
desc: I am born in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. I am 16 years old. Currently, I am a Grade 11 student at <abbr title = 'Kotebe Metropolitan University Menelik I Science Shared Campus' class = 'initialism' > KMUSSC</abbr>, a school of high <abbr title='Primary School Leaving Examination'>PSLE</abbr> scorers from Addis Ababa. I spent most of my free time programming. I enjoy taking part in programming competitions. Other than that, I also love cooking and playing chess.
desc1: I am highly motivated and am deeply passionate about learning a new thing. I am known for completing projects ahead of deadlines. My favorite subjects that I enjoy at school are ICT and Mathematics. I often struggle in world history.
project0Desc: Pong game created using pygame, a python libray.
project1Desc: A game where player sliding right and left to not get hit my obstacle. I made it up using Unity Game Development Platform
project2Desc: This is to make a page more readable by using thresholding in python openCV libary.
